## Bio

I am a mexican researcher with expertise on systems biology and bioinformatics 
applied to the study of human diseases, such as cancer. My research is focused
on multi-omics data to find potential biomarkers and therapeutic targets. 
My studies were held at UNAM, but now I have been selected to perform a
postdoctoral position at University of Luxembourg.
